flightsim.simconnect
Enum SimConnectPeriod

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<SimConnectPeriod>
      flightsim.simconnect.SimConnectPeriod
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SimConnectPeriod>
public enum SimConnectPeriod
extends java.lang.Enum<SimConnectPeriod>

The SimConnectPeriod enumeration type is used with the SimConnect.requestDataOnSimObject(int, int, int, SimConnectPeriod) call to specify how often data is to be sent to the client. 

 $Id: SimConnectPeriod.java,v 1.3 2007-05-16 19:59:36 lc Exp $

Author:
lc0277
See Also:
SimConnect

Enum Constant Summary
NEVER
          Specifies that the data is not to be sent.
ONCE
          Specifies that the data should be sent once only.
SECOND
          Specifies that the data should be sent once every second.
SIM_FRAME
          Specifies that the data should be sent every simulated frame, whether that frame is rendered or not.
VISUAL_FRAME
          Specifies that the data should be sent every visual (rendered) frame.

Enum Constant Detail

NEVER

public static final SimConnectPeriod NEVER
Specifies that the data is not to be sent.

ONCE

public static final SimConnectPeriod ONCE
Specifies that the data should be sent once only. Note that this is not an efficient way of receiving data frequently, use one of the other periods if there is a regular frequency to the data request.

VISUAL_FRAME

public static final SimConnectPeriod VISUAL_FRAME
Specifies that the data should be sent every visual (rendered) frame.

SIM_FRAME

public static final SimConnectPeriod SIM_FRAME
Specifies that the data should be sent every simulated frame, whether that frame is rendered or not.

SECOND

public static final SimConnectPeriod SECOND
Specifies that the data should be sent once every second.
